data.title: EarthScatterLikelihood: Event rates and likelihoods for Dark Matter direct detection in the presence of Earth-Scattering
data.name: EarthScatterLikelihood
data.description: Code for calculating event rates and likelihoods for Dark Matter direct detection experiments in the presence of Earth-Scattering

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "You can compile the EarthScatterLikelihood code using the Makefile in the [`src/`](src/) folder. Simply run `Make` from that folder and it will compile the `calcContour` binary. To run parameter recon"
"Code for calculating event rates and likelihoods for Earth-scattering DM, released in association with the paper..."

"You can compile the EarthScatterLikelihood code using the Makefile in the [`src/`](src/) folder. Simply run `Make` from that folder and it will compile the `calcContour` binary. To run parameter reconstructions, you can then do: `./calcContour ...`"
